column1: Little Goat Diner////We decided to sample the fat Elvis pancakes
column2: which included peanut butter and banana as well as a maple bacon syrup. They were delicious and great for all of us to share. The most memorable thing that we had
column3: and seriously one of the best things I've had to eat in the last five years
column4: was the this little pig goes to China. It was an absolute flavor symphony that worked just about everywhere in my mouth! It included a sesame cheddar biscuit
column6: an egg over top and some delicious sweet and spicy chili garlic chive sauce. This is the sort of thing that I could write a book about.
